net.sf.mmm.util.date.api

Interface DurationUtil

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DurationUtilImpl

    public interface DurationUtil
    This is a collection of utility functions for dealing with time and durations.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CDI_NAME
      The CDI name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String formatMilliseconds(long millis)
      This method formats the given milliseconds as a human readable String.
      String formatNanoseconds(long nanos)
      This method formats the given nanoseconds as a human readable String.
      String formatSeconds(long seconds)
      This method formats the given seconds as a human readable String.

    • Field Detail

      • CDI_NAME

        static final String CDI_NAME
        The CDI name.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • formatNanoseconds

        String formatNanoseconds(long nanos)
        This method formats the given nanoseconds as a human readable String.
        nanos formatNanoseconds(nanos)
        1 "0.000000001"
        61000000000 "1:01"
        7141123456789" "1:59:01.123456789"
        1234567890123456" "14D06:47:07.890123456"
        Parameters:
        nanos - is a duration in nanoseconds.
        Returns:
        a human readable duration.

      • formatMilliseconds

        String formatMilliseconds(long millis)
        This method formats the given milliseconds as a human readable String.
        millis formatMilliseconds(millis)
        1 "0.001"
        61000 "1:01"
        7141123" "1:59:01.123"
        1234567890" "14D06:47:07.890"
        Parameters:
        millis - is a duration in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        a human readable duration.

      • formatSeconds

        String formatSeconds(long seconds)
        This method formats the given seconds as a human readable String.
        seconds formatSeconds(seconds)
        1 "1"
        61 "1:01"
        7141" "1:59:01"
        1234567" "14D06:56:07"
        Parameters:
        seconds - is a duration in seconds.
        Returns:
        a human readable duration.
